pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculating Bilateral and Multilateral Price Indexes // Preparing a scanner data set for price dynamics calculations (data selecting, data classification, data matching, data filtering). Computing bilateral and multilateral indexes. For details on these methods see: de Haan and Krsinich (2017) doi:10.1111/roiw.12304 and Diewert and Fox (2020) doi:10.1080/07350015.2020.1816176.
